mapper.select: SELECT kanban_num AS kanbanNum, kanban_content AS kanbanContent, kanban_importance AS kanbanImportance, kanban_state AS kanbanState, kanban_deadline AS kanbanDeadline, kanban_boardNum AS kanbanBoardNum, kanban_modifyTime AS kanbanContent FROM kanban WHERE kanban_userId = #{userId} ORDER BY kanban_modifyTime ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kanban ( kanban_userId, kanban_content, kanban_importance, kanban_deadline, kanban_boardNum ) VALUES ( #{kanbanUserId}, #{kanbanContent}, #{kanbanImportance}, #{kanbanDeadline}, #{kanbanBoardNum} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE kanban
SET kanban_State = "DOING"
SET kanban_State = "DONE"
WHERE kanban_num = #{kanbanNum}
